ask.title: Virtual Host Configuration
ask.help:
Setup virtual IP and hostname for the SAP system
Select this checkbox if you want to setup virtual IP and hostname for the SAP system.
ask.question: Setup virtual IP and hostname for the SAP system

ask.help:
Virtual Hostname
Enter the virtual hostname the SAP system should use internally.
ask.question: Virt. Hostname

script.source:
function check_hostname() { local host=$1
LC_ALL=POSIX
[ -z "$host" ] && echo "You need to provide a hostname." && return 1 [ "${#host}" -gt 13 ] && echo "The hostname cannot be longer than 13 chars. You entered '${#host}' chars." && return 1 [ -n "${host//[0-9A-Za-z-]/}" ] && echo "The hostname can only consist of an alphanumeric string and a hyphen ('-'). Found this: '${host//[0-9A-Za-z-]/}'." && return 1
return 0 } CHECK=$( cat /tmp/ay_q_virt_network ) if [ "$CHECK" = "false" ]; then exit 0
fi check_hostname "$VAL"

ask.help:
Virtual IP address
Enter the IP address matching the Virtual Hostname for your SAP system.
ask.question: Enter (virt.) IP-Addr

script.source:
function check_ip() { local ip=$1 tmp phys_ip
if [ -e /tmp/may_q_ip_addr ] then phys_ip=`< /tmp/may_q_ip_addr` else phys_ip=$( host $( hostname ) | gawk '{ print $4 }' ) fi
[ -z "$ip" ] && echo "You must provide a valid IP address!" && return 1 [ "${#ip}" -lt 7 ] && echo "Is this a valid IP address? You entered only '${#ip}' chars." && return 1 [ -n "${ip//[0-9.]/}" ] && echo "An IP address can only contain digits and dots ('.'). Found this: '${ip//[0-9.]/}'." && return 1 tmp="${ip//[0-9]/}" [ "${#tmp}" -ne 3 ] && echo "An IP address can only contain 3 dots." && return 1 [ "${phys_ip}" = "${ip}" ] && echo "The virt. IP address has to differ from the phys. IP address ($ip)." && return 1
return 0 } CHECK=$( cat /tmp/ay_q_virt_network ) if [ "$CHECK" = "false" ]; then exit 0
fi
check_ip "$VAL"

ask.help:
Virtual IP netmask
Enter the netmask matching the IP address for your Virtual Hostname.
ask.question: Enter (virt.) netmask

script.source:
function check_ip() { local ip=$1 tmp phys_ip
[ -z "$ip" ] && echo "You must provide a valid IP address!" && return 1 [ "${#ip}" -lt 7 ] && echo "Is this a valid netmask? You entered only '${#ip}' chars." && return 1 [ -n "${ip//[0-9.]/}" ] && echo "A netmask can only contain digits and dots ('.'). Found this: '${ip//[0-9.]/}'." && return 1 tmp="${ip//[0-9]/}" [ "${#tmp}" -ne 3 ] && echo "An IP address can only contain 3 dots." && return 1
return 0 } CHECK=$( cat /tmp/ay_q_virt_network ) if [ "$CHECK" = "false" ]; then rm -f /tmp/ay_q_virt_ip_addr rm -f /tmp/ay_q_virt_hostname rm -f /tmp/ay_q_virt_ip_netmask exit 0
fi
check_ip "$VAL"
